questionTitle: Which of the following has an application on the iPhone to manage its service deployments?
questionExplanation: Amazon Web Services has a specific iPhone Application Hosting page for iPhone developers.

questionOption1: iDisk is an online storage drive that can browsed and from which items can be shared
questionOption2: iWeb Publish is a hosted Web site that can be accessed either through your own personal domain or through a personal page at Me.com
questionOption3: iGoogle is Apple’s instant messaging service that interoperates with AIM
questionExplanation: iChat is Apple’s instant messaging service that interoperates with AIM.

questionTitle: Which of the following third-party application uses AWS APIs to control the various components and instances you have running?
questionExplanation: An advantage of Android and Windows Mobile is that they have their own dedicated infrastructure on which developers can host their applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following web service can be controlled by iAWSManager cloud app from an iPhone?
questionExplanation: iAWSManager lets you control your AWS EC2, ELB, S3, CF, SQS, and SDB Web services from an iPhone.

questionOption1: MobileMe Mail adds a number of features to hosted e-mail including better screen control and formatting, picture handling, and a rich Web experience
questionOption2: MobileMe Calendar is an updated version of the online calendar application
questionOption3: iPhone applications are hosted on the iTunes App Store
questionExplanation: Many applications are heavy users of Internet or Web services and require dedicated infrastructure to stage.

questionTitle: Which of the following IM service is invented by Blackberry?
questionExplanation: BlackBerry has an IM service called BlackBerry Messenger.

questionTitle: __________ Mobile Data-Service Connection Service can connect to mobile BlackBerry devices through a TCP/IP connection.
questionExplanation: BIS stands for BlackBerry Internet Service.

questionTitle: Which of the following Symbian microkernel architecture is designed to work with a single processor?
questionExplanation: Unlike other OSs, Symbian includes device drivers in the kernel itself.

questionTitle: The Windows CE ___ kernel is a suite of Microsoft applications optimized for smaller display size and using the Windows API.
questionExplanation: Microsoft has worked hard to make Windows Mobile devices a natural extension for Windows developers upon which to position their products.

questionTitle: Which of the following platform features are used in Windows 7 by Microsoft?
questionExplanation: Applications for Windows Phone 7 are based on the .NET Compact Framework 4, XNA, and Silverlight Applications.
